body: Many aberrations have little use for treasure, possessing only what hangs from the remains of their previous victims. Others are cunning adversaries that use various magic items and treasure to enhance their abilities.
name: Aberration
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Appendix/Treasure Generator/Step 2 Determine Treasure Type/Aberration

sections.body: A, B, D, E (add F, G, H if the creature is cunning).
sections.name: Treasure Types
